name: Colourbound
description:
Bring life through paint as you traverse the world of Colourbound!

Right your mistakes by finishing the painting or be trapped forever!

Jump, leap, bound and phase your way through each level!

Paint: see the painting come alive as you move through each level.

Phase: Be unbound from the confines of walls by phasing through them.

Paths: Choose how you tackle each level with no set paths.
